poem:
### Cinematic Alchemy

In Hollywood's glare,  
golden dreams percolate,  
while Karla reigns,  
a cartel king, reborn,  
notes of daring echo  
in celluloid corridors.  
Europe's applause fades  
into whispers, yet  
in this second skin,  
the truth dances—  
a reel of evolution,  
tapestry of light,  
lifting the veils,  
revealing new realms.
